attributes.action: I propose a Department of Efficiency to review the government's actions.
attributes.additional_details: "I believe corruption exists within the UK government, and it is high time for a change to restore integrity, transparency, and accountability to our political system."
attributes.background: I am calling for an online petition to advocate for HMRC to be audited by an independent entity, comparable to the Department for Government Efficiency. Furthermore, I believe it is essential that the auditors themselves undergo independent scrutiny to

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701630
